regex.name: getUrl
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re,requests def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): source = requests.get('http://sports24.club/tv/[makelist.param2]',headers={'user-agent':'Mozilla/5.0'}).content url= re.findall("xurl\s*=\s*atob\('(.*?)'",source)[0].decode('base64') return url
